add_action.description: Add an action to the NSFW punishment list.

add_text_action.description: Add an action to the NSFW text punishment list.

remove_action.description: Remove an action from the NSFW punishment list.

params.action: Exact action string to remove (e.g. timeout, delete)

remove_text_action.description: Remove an action from the NSFW text punishment list.

params.action: Exact action string to remove (e.g. timeout, delete)

view_actions.description: View the current list of NSFW punishment actions.

view_text_actions.description: View the current list of NSFW text punishment actions.

add_category.description: Add a category to NSFW detection.

remove_category.description: Remove a category from NSFW detection.

set_threshold.description: Set the threshold for NSFW detection confidence.

view_threshold.description: View the current NSFW detection threshold.

add_text_category.description: Add a category to NSFW text detection.

remove_text_category.description: Remove a category from NSFW text detection.

add_text_excluded_channel.description: Exclude a channel from NSFW text scanning.

remove_text_excluded_channel.description: Allow NSFW text scanning in a previously excluded channel.

view_text_excluded_channels.description: View channels excluded from NSFW text scanning.

set_text_threshold.description: Set the threshold for NSFW text detection confidence.

view_text_threshold.description: View the current NSFW text detection threshold.

set_text_scanning.description: Enable or disable NSFW scanning for message text.

view_text_scanning.description: View the current NSFW text scanning state.

set_text_strike_filter.description: Enable or disable NSFW text detection only for users with strikes.

view_text_strike_filter.description: View the current NSFW text strike-only filtering state.

actions.none: No NSFW actions are currently set.
actions.heading:
**Current NSFW actions:**
{actions}

text_actions.none: No NSFW text actions are currently set.
text_actions.heading:
**Current NSFW text actions:**
{actions}

threshold.unset: NSFW detection threshold is not set.

text_categories.none: No text categories are currently set.
text_categories.heading:
**Current NSFW text categories:**
{categories}

text_excluded_channels.added: {channel} will be skipped during NSFW text scanning.
text_excluded_channels.already_added: {channel} is already excluded from NSFW text scanning.
text_excluded_channels.removed: {channel} will once again be scanned for NSFW text.
text_excluded_channels.not_found: {channel} is not currently excluded from NSFW text scanning.
text_excluded_channels.list_empty: No channels are excluded from NSFW text scanning.

text_threshold.invalid: Text detection threshold must be between 0.0 and 1.0.
text_threshold.set: NSFW text detection threshold set to {value:.2f}.
text_threshold.unset: NSFW text detection threshold is not set.

text_scanning.enabled: NSFW text scanning has been enabled.
text_scanning.disabled: NSFW text scanning has been disabled.

text_strike_filter.enabled: NSFW text strike-only filtering has been enabled.
text_strike_filter.disabled: NSFW text strike-only filtering has been disabled.
text_strike_filter.status: NSFW text strike-only filtering is currently **{state}**.
